name: Snowy Surprise
description:
Three baby penguins are going on an adventure to find a good present for their mother. As mama wakes up, she finds all three kids are missing. Now worried for the safety of her babies, she starts looking for them. Find out where they got lost and help mommy pingu get her children back home. 

Controlls:

WASD: Moven

Space: Jump

LShift: Sprint

Known bug penguin in cave may not exit cave due to collision of ice cubes. May be ai miscalculation. Try to exit game with escape. 

Note(00:11 21.05.2022): Found Bug solved it uploaded a fixed Version at 00:12
